attributes.action: Limit the use of fireworks in urban residential areas to specific dates only.
attributes.additional_details: It is fun to use fireworks to celebrate an event, but this is not what is currently happening. People are using fireworks over several weeks, often nightly.  This causes a disturbance for resident's and of course animals over an extended period of time.
attributes.background: Ban the use of fireworks in urban residential areas except for specific dates, such as November 5th, Diwali, and New Year amongst others.  Currently fireworks are used in residential areas over several weeks, particularly around November 5th, causing a nuisance and disturbance to residents.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906

Make it illegal for fireworks to be set off on days other than Nov 5 and Dec 31
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
